LicenseEndpointId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^le-[0-9a-f]{32}$  
Update requires: Replacement

ProductId.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^[0-9a-z]{1,32}-[.0-9a-z]{1,32}$  
Update requires: Replacement

Port.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Family.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Update requires: No interruption

Vendor.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 64  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:(aws[a-zA-Z-]*):deadline:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]{12}:license-endpoint/le-[0-9a-z]{32}/metered-product/[0-9a-z]{1,32}-[.0-9a-z]{1,32}  
Update requires: No interruption
